channel.title: Pidgin full services support
channel.description:
Hello there, Maybe this is a noob question,but how to install pidgin with all messaging services enabled (like icq,yahoo,msn and so on) like have in Debian,in Whonix this proprietary services have been deleted.
Thanks.

item.title: Pidgin full services support
item.dc:creator: bmtkn1
item.description:
Yes guys I know Psi and Pidgin are not really secure,im already using Tor messenger,but i also need Pidgin functionality at least now,is it possible?

Debian have full,Whonix less,how to fix this if repositories are the same?

Read full topic

item.title: Pidgin full services support
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Please see this thread which was very recently posted and which is very similar to your question:
https://forums.whonix.org/t/psi-plus-operation-system-leak-info

Read full topic
